message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LO, cs.PL, cs.DB, cs.SE. 

The paper discusses an extension of Answer-Set Programming (ASP) called Nested HEX-Programs, which allows for subprogram calls and access to external computations. ASP is a well-established declarative programming paradigm used in artificial intelligence (AI) and knowledge representation. Therefore, cs.AI is the most likely sub-category. The paper also discusses modularity and reasoning over subprogram results, which are topics related to logic and computation (cs.LO) and programming languages (cs.PL). Additionally, the paper mentions applications such as belief set merging and user-defined aggregate functions, which are topics related to databases (cs.DB). Finally, the paper discusses the user-friendliness of the extension, which is a topic related to software engineering (cs.SE).
